diff_hunk:
@@ -56,6 +70,7 @@ def __init__(self):
         self._forward_pre_hooks = OrderedDict()
         self._modules = OrderedDict()
         self.training = True
+        self._name = ''
body: What about we use `named_children` in `__setstate__`? Since all instances of modules will be unpickled and children will have to be unpickled first for the unpickling to succeed, at the end all modules will be named (except the top-most, which we don't really care about)
body_html: What about we use named_children in __setstate__? Since all instances of modules will be unpickled and children will have to be unpickled first for the unpickling to succeed, at the end all modules will be named (except the top-most, which we don't really care about)
body_text: What about we use named_children in __setstate__? Since all instances of modules will be unpickled and children will have to be unpickled first for the unpickling to succeed, at the end all modules will be named (except the top-most, which we don't really care about)
